page.title: 04SHEEPWASH LANE BRIDGE
page.content: The bridge provides a route for the bridleway over the A3(M).When we went to see it we noticed that barbed wire blocked the way.Then we read in a newspaper clipping,it said that Hampshire County Council has made a new move in the running fight to get the Sheepwash Lane Bridleway reinstated across a private farm bridge over the A3(M) motorway at Horndean. In an attempt to solve a 7 year stalemate, the county will publish a Draft Creation Order to restore the Bridleway which was cut by the A3(M) motorway in 1978. At the present time horse riders and ramblers have to take an alternative and more dangerous route across the Hazelton interchange roundabout over the motorway. A spokesman said'Many people would like to walk or ride horses on the original route'.
